infotexts.afflictiondescription.stimulants: Your life is in your hands, but not for too long.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.defibin: On the edge of the blade.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.confus: Escape from the inevitable has consequences.
infotexts.entitydescription.reforged_b1: The 'A.B.Y.S.S.' warsuit, is a new generation divesuit granting much greater protection to it's user due to it's power system.
infotexts.entitydescription.reforged_b2: The 'A.B.Y.S.S.' warsuit, is a new generation divesuit granting much greater protection to it's user due to it's power system. Advanced system consumes more power now. It is recommended to use only high quality energy sources.
infotexts.entitydescription.reforged_h1: The 'A.B.Y.S.S.' helmet, a necessary part of the warsuit diving kit.
infotexts.entitydescription.reforged_h2: The 'A.B.Y.S.S.' helmet, a necessary part of the warsuit diving kit.
infotexts.entitydescription.re_bp1: Blueprint of one of the recent technology of Europe. There are rumors that it can only be obtained from researchers or the military.
infotexts.entitydescription.re_bp2: Blueprint of one of the most advanced developments in Europe. There are rumors that it can only be obtained only from researchers.
infotexts.entitydescription.fusioncore: Battery rod frame for the divesuit powersystem.
infotexts.entitydescription.fusioncore_u: A special rechargable battery rod for the divesuit powersystem. Experimental prototype, has some drawbacks, mainly insufficient capacity and recoil.
infotexts.entitydescription.fusioncore_t: A special rechargable battery rod for the divesuit powersystem. Second generation, based on a different isotope. Workhorse.
infotexts.entitydescription.fusioncore_i: A special rechargable battery rod for the divesuit powersystem. Using alien material as a source, it achieves incredible performance. However, it required the completion of the power distribution system.
infotexts.entitydescription.energycell: Specific battery-type power distributor. Not suitable for most devices. Avoid short-circuit.
infotexts.entitydescription.energycell2: Specific battery-type power distributor with extended capacity. Not suitable for most devices. Do not short-circuit under any circumstances.
infotexts.entitydescription.coresocket: Receiver for the fusion cores сombined with a power distributor. Сan be used as a small portable generator.
infotexts.entitydescription.re_medmod: This module is a very multifunctional tool, but medical supervision and stimulation injections are still its main purpose.
infotexts.entitydescription.re_scanner: Handheld device that shows information about the vital signs and status of nearby humans.
